sources.title: Il colosso di Roma (1964)
sources.description: In ancient Rome, the people finally oust their despised king, Tarquinius, and declare the city a republic. Tarquinius makes an alliance with the Etruscan king, Porsenna, to take back power in Rome, but a Roman general, the heroic Mucius, sets out to stop him. Watch on RetroFlix:Â  https://retroflix.org/il-colosso-di-roma-1964/
